business.name: MK Nails
business.tagline: Soft, bold nails for women who know what they want.
business.description: Hi ðŸ‘‹ my name is Maria Ortega. I am a certified nail technician with 10 years of experience, passionate about creating nails that make you feel confident and cared for.
business.fullAddress: 19800 S Dixie Hwy suite 9, Cutler Bay, Florida 33157

services.name: Classic Manicure
services.description: Cuticle care, shaping, and a classic polish finish.

services.name: Gel Manicure
services.description: Long-lasting gel color with a glossy, chip-resistant finish.

services.name: Nail Art
services.description: Custom designs from minimal to statement looks, tailored to you.

services.name: Spa Manicure
services.description: Luxurious soak, scrub, massage, and mask for tired hands.

services.name: Hard Gel Full Set
services.description: Durable, sculpted extensions with your choice of shape and length.

services.name: Add-On Services
services.description: Extras like nail repair, French tips, chrome, and more.

testimonials.name: Sofia M.
testimonials.text: Maria is absolutely amazing! My nails look better than I ever imagined. She's so talented and makes you feel so welcome. I'm already booked for my next appointment!

testimonials.name: Jessica R.
testimonials.text: Best gel manicure I've had in years. The designs are gorgeous and they lasted 3 weeks without chipping. Highly recommend MK Nails to anyone!

testimonials.name: Diana L.
testimonials.text: The attention to detail is incredible. Maria listened to exactly what I wanted and executed it perfectly. Worth every penny!

testimonials.name: Carmen T.
testimonials.text: I've been coming here for months. The spa manicure is my favorite - so relaxing and my hands feel so soft afterward. Maria is a true professional.

testimonials.name: Adriana G.
testimonials.text: The custom nail art was exactly what I envisioned. Maria's creativity and skill are unmatched. Best nail salon in Cutler Bay!
